gridData.name: http-url
gridData.description: REST url for fetching data.

gridData.name: http-method
gridData.description: Type of HTTP call, POST,GET etc.

gridData.name: data
gridData.description: Local Data binding.

gridData.name: data-reader
gridData.description: Key in JSON Datasource for records.

gridData.name: enable-checkbox
gridData.description: Enables checkbox for each row, this allows user for multi selection.

gridData.name: enable-drag
gridData.description: Nodes can be dragged.

gridData.name: enable-drop
gridData.description: Any node can be dropped in the tree structure.

gridData.name: across-tree
gridData.description: Dragging and dropping is possible across tree.

gridData.name: badge
gridData.description: Describes the badge value that has to be displayed tree node.

gridData.name: context-menu
gridData.description: Context Menu provides the list of menus on right click (for Array structure: refer typescript code in source tab)

gridData.name: display-key
gridData.description: Display Key provides the user defined key to parent json Array (parent key name can be changed)

gridData.name: child-array-key
gridData.description: Child Array Key provides the user defined key to children json object (children key name can be changed)

gridData.name: word-wrap
gridData.description: It is used for wrapping the text when set to false

gridData.name: nodeClick
gridData.description: It will gives you clicked node data.

gridData.name: onTreeNodeChecked
gridData.description: It will gives whole tree data with checked flag status.

gridData.name: onDrag
gridData.description: It is fired when an element or text selection is being dragged by the user.

gridData.name: dragover
gridData.description: It is fired when an element or text selection is being dragged over a valid drop target

gridData.name: onDrop
gridData.description: It is fired when an element or text selection is dropped on a valid drop target.

gridData.name: rightClick
gridData.description: It is fired when clicked on context menu, providing tree node data and selected context menu data.

gridData.name: expandAll ()
gridData.description: Method to expandAll (open all Tree node) view of Tree.

gridData.name: collapseAll ()
gridData.description: Method to collapseAll (close all Tree node) view of Tree

gridData.name: Space or Enter
gridData.description: Performs the default action (e.g. onclick event) for the focused node.

gridData.name: Down Arrow
gridData.description: Moves focus to the next node that is focusable without opening or closing a node.If focus is on the last node, does nothing.

gridData.name: Up Arrow
gridData.description: Moves focus one cell Up.If focus is on the top cell in the column, focus does not move.

gridData.name: Right Arrow
gridData.description: Moves focus down scrolling so the bottom row in the currently visible set of rows becomes the first visible row.If focus is in the last row, focus does not move.
